item.title: DOGE’s Gift to the Chinese Communist Party
item.description: Musk is fulminating against the National Endowment for Democracy without understanding the critical role it plays.

item.title: Impeach the Precedent
item.description: Trump’s flood-the-zone approach means his political enemies, once in power, will follow the same playbook.

item.title: Georgetown’s Daughter of Hamas
item.description: A woman listed as a graduate student at the university has family ties to the terror group and has cheered its attacks on Israel.

item.title: America Is Playing AI Blackjack with the CCP — and at Risk of Losing
item.description: When it comes to artificial intelligence, the Chinese Communist Party just showed us a ten.

item.title: Solid Gold Proves All That Glitters Isn’t Necessarily Good, or Coherent
item.description: Brooklyn Museum’s 500-object show is a gilded albatross.
